tool_description: Returns a list of publicly discoverable cameras from within the Evercam system.
name: Evercam Public Cameras
title: Evercam Public Cameras

api_list.name: Live base64 jpg image
api_list.description: Returns live, base64 encoded, jpg from the camera.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Camera id to get the live image for

api_list.name: Live jpg image
api_list.description: Returns live jpg from the camera.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Camera id to get the live image for

api_list.name: Camera information
api_list.description: Returns all data for a given camera.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Camera id to get data for

api_list.name: Public Cameras
api_list.description: Fetch a list of publicly discoverable cameras from within the Evercam system.

optional_parameters.name: id_contains
optional_parameters.description: Search for cameras whose id contain the given value

optional_parameters.name: id_ends_with
optional_parameters.description: Search for cameras whose id ends with the given value

optional_parameters.name: id_starts_with
optional_parameters.description: Search for cameras whose id starts with the given value

optional_parameters.name: is_near_to
optional_parameters.description: Search for cameras within 1000 meters of a given address or longitude latitiude point

optional_parameters.name: within_distance
optional_parameters.description: Search for cameras within a greater range of the specified is_near_to point in meters

optional_parameters.name: case_sensitive
optional_parameters.description: Whether search terms are case sensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results. Defaults to 100, can't be more than 1000

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset into the search results Defaults to 0
